head.title: phycas
head.authors: Paul O. Lewis, Mark T. Holder, David L. Swofford, (GUI by Vanessa Jackson)

command.label: Alias
command.description: Specifies a shortened name for a command or series of commands (note the expanded command must be in single quotes)

command.label: Set
command.description: Sets general program behavior or changes settings of other commands without executing the command

cmd_param.label: OutWidth
cmd_param.description: Number of characters per line in the output display

command.label: TaxStatus
command.description: Displays information about the current taxa

cmd_param.label: FullDisplay
cmd_param.description: If true, a table with taxon number, name and inclusion status is shown. If false, a brief summary is displayed.

cmd_param.label: ShowExcluded
cmd_param.description: Controls whether or not excluded are listed in the summary

command.label: TaxSet
command.description: Specifies a name to be assigned to a group of taxa

command.label: IncludeTaxa
command.description: Includes taxa that are in memory, but have been made inactive by an ExcludeTaxa command. The numbering of taxa is not affected by either IncludeTaxa or ExcludeTaxa.

command.label: ExcludeTaxa
command.description: Removes a set of taxa from further analyses, but does not alter th numbering of taxa. The taxa can be reactivated by using the IncludeTaxa command

command.label: TreeSet
command.description: Specifies a name to be assigned to a group of trees

command.label: GetTrees
command.description: Reads NEXUS Trees blocks in a file

command.label: ClearTrees
command.description: Removes the specified trees from memory

command.label: Execute
command.description: Reads the specified NEXUS file, executing the commands from all recognized blocks

command.label: MCMC

message.failure: there are no taxa in memory

command.description: Starts an MCMC run using the data currently stored in memory

cmd_param.label: NIterations
cmd_param.description: Number of iterations to run the MCMC simulation

cmd_param.label: NChains
cmd_param.description: Number of chains to be run simultaneously (all but one of these will be heated chains)

cmd_param.label: SampleEvery
cmd_param.description: Sample interval

cmd_param.label: ReportEvery
cmd_param.description: Report Interval

cmd_param.label: PlotEvery
cmd_param.description: Frequency with which majority rule consensus tree will be displayed during an MCMC run

cmd_param.label: ParamOut
cmd_param.description: Output destination for summaries of parameter values

cmd_param.label: SplitOut
cmd_param.description: Destination for tabular summary of split frequencies

cmd_param.label: RNSeed
cmd_param.description: Seed for pseudorandom number generator used in MCMC runs

cmd_param.label: IgnoreData
cmd_param.description: If specified, MCMC will run with no data and thus the posterior will be equivalent to the prior

cmd_param.label: BushMoveWeight
cmd_param.description: Probability of proposing a dimension changing move to a less resolved (or more resolved) tree topology

cmd_param.label: GibbsEvery
cmd_param.description: Number of steps that must elapse before another round of Gibbs sampling is done

cmd_param.label: SliceDiv
cmd_param.description: Number of divisions in slice after adapting slice sampler unit width.

message.failure: GibbsEvery is set to 0 (so slice sampling will not be performed)

cmd_param.label: InitUWidth
cmd_param.description: Initial width of slice unit for sampling kappa values.

message.failure: GibbsEvery is set to 0 (so slice sampling will not be performed)

cmd_param.label: ScalerMoveWeight
cmd_param.description: Determines the probability of a tree scaling move, which scales all edges lengths in the tree up or down. Weights of all possible moves are normalized to obtain probabilities.
cmd_param.gui_description: Relative weight of tree scaling move

cmd_param.label: LocalMoveWeight
cmd_param.description: Determines probability of attempting a Larget-Simon LOCAL move. Weights of all possible moves are normalized to obtain the corresponding probability of proposing a move of some type.

cmd_param.label: KStart
cmd_param.description: Initial value of kappa parameter (should be moved to model description)

cmd_param.label: KappaPriorMean
cmd_param.description: Mean of the exponential prior for the kappa parameter (will make this more general in the future)
cmd_param.gui_description: Mean of exponential prior for kappa

cmd_param.label: NCat
cmd_param.description: The number of rate categories for discrete gamma among site rate variation

cmd_param.label: PTopoPrior
cmd_param.description: If TopoPriorFlat is false, PTopoPrior is used as the parameter of the geometric prior across resolution classes. A value near 0 means prior will be close to flat across resolution classes (but not across trees), and a value near 1 produces a prior that strongly favors less-resolved trees.
cmd_param.gui_description: Parameter of geometric of topology prior

cmd_param.label: FlatTopoPrior
cmd_param.description: True specifies that prior should be flat across all topologies (regardless of the number of internal nodes). False specifies that prior should be geometric, with PTopoPrior being the parameter.

cmd_param.label: MeanEdgeLenHyperPrior
cmd_param.gui_description: Mean of the hyperprior on edge lengths

cmd_param.label: ResClassPrior
cmd_param.gui_description: Adjust for # trees in resolution class

cmd_param.label: PolytomyLnPriorRatio
cmd_param.description: Log of the prior ratio for topology with m nodes to topology with m+1 nodes
cmd_param.gui_description: Log of the delete-edge prior ratio

cmd_param.label: Taxonset
cmd_param.description: The name of the taxon set to be treated as the focal group for purposes of computing phylodiversity measures.

cmd_param.label: PDOutput
cmd_param.description: Output destination for a tab-delimited summary of the output compatible with plotting with GnuPlot or importing into Excel.

command.label: Distribution
command.description: Defines a probability distribution. The name can then be used in any command that requires a distribution (for example when priors are specified).

cmd_param.description: Name to be assigned to the distribution
cmd_param.gui_description: Name to be assigned to the distribution

cmd_param.description: Definition of the distribution

command.label: Sample
command.description: Samples random deviates from the specified probability distribution

cmd_param.label: Distribution
cmd_param.description: Allows specification of the probability distribution from which random deviates are to be sampled (either the distribution description or the name of a previously specified distribution can be provided).

cmd_param.label: NSampled
cmd_param.description: Number of random deviates to sample
cmd_param.gui_description: Number of random deviates to sample

cmd_param.label: Show
cmd_param.description: if true, shows all random deviates sampled followed by a summary (e.g. mean and standard deviation); only the summary is output if NOSHOW is specified

cmd_param.label: Seed
cmd_param.description: Random number generator seed (0 to use the system clock)

cmd_param.label: OutputDestination
cmd_param.description: Destination for output of sampled deviates

cmd_param.label: Precision
cmd_param.description: Specifies precision (number of decimal places) to be used when displaying sampled values

command.label: SCM
command.description: Computes strict consensus merger supertree for trees currently stored

cmd_param.label: TreeOuput
cmd_param.description: Output destination for strict consensus merger supertree description

command.label: GG
command.description: Computes Gelfand-Ghosh statistics for model selection (4-taxa only at this point)

cmd_param.label: Taxonset
cmd_param.description: The name of the taxon set to be used for computing the Gelfand and Ghosh measures.
